mapper.insert: insert into base_position (position_name,department_id,department_name,active,create_date) select #{position_name},#{department_id},#{department_name},'Y',NOW() from dual where exists (select department_id from base_department where department_id=#{department_id})
mapper.select: select position_id,position_name,department_id,department_name,active,create_date from base_position where active='Y' and department_id=#{department_id}
select department_name from base_department where department_name=#{department_name}
select position_name from base_position where position_name=#{position_name} and department_id=#{department_id}
